body_html: So it looks like the crash happens in Estimator. This kind of UnavailableError can happen if your network connection is interrupted, but a higher level framework should detect these and recreate session rather than crashing everything. cc @ispirmustafa since he's the last person to modify this code

body: So it looks like the crash happens in Estimator. This kind of `UnavailableError` can happen if your network connection is interrupted, but a higher level framework should detect these and recreate session rather than crashing everything. cc @ispirmustafa since he's the last person to modify this code
